title: Agriculture and Natural Resources
description: Includes farming, forestry, fishing, and mining.

title: Arts, Media, and Entertainment
description: Covers creative and media-related industries, such as film, music, and publishing.

title: Building and Construction
description: Deals with residential, commercial, and heavy engineering construction.

title: Business and Finance
description: Includes financial services, insurance, and business management.

title: Education, Child Development, and Family Services
description: Focuses on learning institutions and support services.

title: Energy, Environment, and Utilities
description: Encompasses energy production, power distribution, and environmental services.

title: Health Science and Medical Technology
description: Covers healthcare services, biotechnology, and medical device manufacturing.

title: Hospitality, Tourism, and Recreation
description: Includes hotels, restaurants, and other leisure activities.

title: Manufacturing and Product Development
description: Covers the creation of physical goods.

title: Marketing, Sales, and Services
description: Includes advertising, sales, and professional services.

title: Public Services
description: Encompasses public safety, legal practices, and government functions.

title: Transportation
description: Involves logistics, air travel, and ground transport.
